original_text: You know that your ancestors killed the prophets. Now you build up the places where they buried them. So you show that you agree with your ancestors. You agree with what they did.
korean_text: 이와 같이 그들은 죽이고 너희는 무덤을 만드니 너희가 너희 조상의 행한 일에 증인이 되어 옳게 여기는도다

sentences.original_text: You know that your ancestors killed the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 조상들이 선지자들을 죽였다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: Now you build up the places
So you show that you agree with your ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 당신의 조상들과 동의함을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: You agree with what they did
